change.item: sic and unclear moved outside elements pubplaces, publisher, composer, hofclass, key, opus
p. 73 Börner (not Bērner): p. 76 Eichhorn (not Eichhern); p. 78 Maccheroni - title, not composer!
corrected tagging of Cranz to publisher (not place)
